Class RequestDispatcherManagementOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractPort

        • fr.upmc.requestdispatcher.ports.RequestDispatcherManagementOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, RequestDispatcherManagementI

    public class RequestDispatcherManagementOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements RequestDispatcherManagementI
    The class RequestDispactherManagementOutboundPort implements the outbound port through which one calls the component management methods.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 15 novembre 2016
